title: Textile, 1820–25
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller and block printed
description: Very fragile fragment of glazed chintz. Fantastic flower design framed by a jagged outline on a brown ground. Printing done by roller and block combination. Green color achieved by printing yellow and blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1820–25.
1820–25. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller and block printed. Gift of Mrs. Rollin Stickle. 1960-153-1.
